LEO PRIME a=
nd BIG CONVOY had definetly not slowed down!

With TUSCON slowing down to a=
 walk he was able to see a rising tidal
wave of magma flowing towards him f=
rom the interior of the cave
complex beneath.

It was as if he were standin=
g on the inside of a gyser and the water
was rushing foward to burst out. H=
owever this 'water' was made of
liquide stone and it was heated to  over 15=
00 dergees =B0F pushing a

f it as it passed!!!

od there and even
TUSCON's armor would not be able to protect him from the =
fires of the
Earth!


Ahead of him the others were still running, leaping o=
ut of the cave,

thing it going off!"
